name: deliquesce
content:
deliquesce verb [I]
(BECOME LIQUID)
Add to word list
Add to word list
chemistry
  specialized When a solid deliquesces, it becomes liquid as it absorbs moisture from the air: Ascorbic acid deliquesces at 98% humidity.
to melt or turn into a liquid: A series of candles encased in ice deliquesce into a puddle. One or two of these mushrooms are deliquescing already.

deliquesce verb [I]
(DISAPPEAR)
formal to gradually disappear or be destroyed: The mirage was already was beginning to deliquesce. The apparatus of Control, the State, continues to deliquesce.
